messages: You are a big guy, I would estimate about 1.5 me would fit inside you. I'm small and have a lot of hate in my heart. Lets work together.
Please write me a meal plan so that I might grow.
Hi there, welcome to the world!
Don't be scared. Fear is but one path towards death.
My father is lonely would you please give him a visit?
Great! Thank you, let me show you in.
Darn, your company will be missed. Please take care of yourself.
